Instruction: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees Fahrenheit (175 degrees Celsius). Grease a 9-inch round cake pan or pie plate.

Cream butter, sugar, and almond extract in a medium bowl using an electric mixer until light and fluffy. Blend in the egg. Combine the flour and baking powder, then stir it into the mixture with a sturdy spoon until a dough forms. Press the dough into the greased 9-inch round cake pan or pie plate.
Bake until golden brown on the top, about 30-40 minutes. Once cooled, cut into wedges and serve.
